column1: Funeral services will be held at 1 p.m. Tuesday
column2: June 16 at the Horan Funeral Home in Chippewa Falls. Rev. William P. Felix will be officiating. Interment will be in Hope Cemetery in Chippewa Falls. Friends may call from 4 to 8 p.m. Monday
column3: June 15 and until the time of services on Tuesday at the funeral home.
